etymology.description: 燕麦(燕麥) (yànmài, 'oats') + 粥(粥) (zhōu, 'porridge') — oat porridge
etymology.interpretation: 燕麦粥(燕麥粥) refers to a nourishing dish made primarily from oats and water or milk. This combination logically describes a type of porridge made from oats.

examples.chinese: 我喜欢吃燕麦粥(燕麥粥)，他也很推荐(他也很推薦)。
examples.pinyin: wǒ xǐhuān chī yànmàizhōu(燕麥粥)，tā yě hěn tuījiàn(他也很推薦)。
examples.english: I like to eat oatmeal porridge, and he highly recommends it too.

examples.chinese: 燕麦粥(燕麥粥)是很健康的早餐选择(是很健康的早餐選擇)。
examples.pinyin: yànmàizhōu(燕麥粥) shì hěn jiànkāng de zǎocān xuǎnzé(是很健康的早餐選擇)。
examples.english: Oatmeal porridge is a very healthy breakfast option.
